cancellationPolicies.label: Deposit Only rates
cancellationPolicies.description: This property has a 3 day cancellation policy. Failure to cancel within this time will result in a cancellation charge equal to the first night of your stay, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information).

dorms.name: Deluxe 4 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: These room sleep 4 guests,  with single beds some with loft beds .All beds have fresh linen and towels, plus your own personal safe . Free WIFI .Ceiling fan  and split air conditioners, additional extra extra in summer months for $1 for 8 hours.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Twin Room Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: This room sleeps 2 guests and has 2 single beds in a private room. All with fresh Linen with towels. Television, Fridge with 2 complementary bottles of water, personal safe with side table and lamp. Ceiling Fan and air conditioning.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only

Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Standard Double Bed Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: This room sleeps 2 guests .With 1 Queen Size Bed in a private room . With fresh linen with towels & 4 pillows, fridge with 2 complementary bottles of water , 2 side tables with lamps ,TV. Ceiling Fan  and split air conditioning. Free WIFI

freeCancellation.label: Free Cancellation rates
freeCancellation.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 16th Oct 2025 (AEST) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 16th Oct 2025 (AEST) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.
